summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Digital Sahayak application - backend APIs and frontend UI integration testing

ui_bugs.issue: Dialog overlay intercepts clicks when multiple modals are opened sequentially
ui_bugs.selector: Add Yojana button after Add Job dialog

passed_tests: All 13 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Homepage loads with hero section, stats, features, latest jobs/yojana sections
Navigation bar with logo, Job Alerts, Yojana links, Login/Register buttons
WhatsApp FAB visible and accessible (wa.me link working)
Jobs page with search, category filter, state filter functionality
Yojana page with search, category filter, state filter functionality
Admin dashboard shows stats and can create new jobs
API integration between frontend and backend
Categories endpoint returning job/yojana categories and states
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix modal overlay issue in admin dashboard - ensure proper dialog state management when opening multiple modals sequentially
